ygData.subject: Re: novice questions
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks for the advice.  I think I ll stick with the high-elf for now. I wanted to play a cleric of something-Nife the god of healing.  But the high-elf s all
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks for the advice. I think I'll stick with the high-elf for now.
I wanted to play a cleric of something-Nife the god of healing. But
the high-elf's all worship Tunare, I guess. Oh well.

>From: Steven Johnson <SJohnson@...>
>
>Congratulations, Curtis.. Your personal life will start suffering very
>soon from this highly addictive game.

I think you're probably right. Good thing I already have a
girlfriend. Maybe she won't leave me. :)

BTW, I'm Ergo. Me and my friends are playing on the test server.
